items.name: Pancakesa
items.description: Fluffy pancakes served with maple syrup and butter.

items.name: Eggs Benedict
items.description: Poached eggs served on toasted English muffins with ham and hollandaise sauce.

items.name: French Toast
items.description: Thick slices of bread dipped in a mixture of beaten eggs and milk, then fried until golden brown.

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description: Romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

items.name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
items.description: Grilled chicken breast topped with lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise on a toasted bun.

items.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
items.description: Assorted vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce, served with steamed rice.

items.name: Filet Mignon
items.description: Tender filet mignon grilled to perfection, served with mashed potatoes and seasonal vegetables.

items.name: Salmon with Lemon Butter Sauce
items.description: Grilled salmon fillet topped with a tangy lemon butter sauce, served with roasted potatoes.

items.name: Pasta Primavera
items.description: Pasta tossed with seasonal vegetables in a light cream sauce.
